room_title: Escape room "Lottery Lost" by Escape 812 in Indianapolis
review: I had a great time finding Grandma's lottery ticket with my middle school aged kids and their friends. We didn't know what to expect when we got there, but the atmosphere was warm and inviting, the hostesses were friendly and helpful, and the game was challenging and super fun! I think it's a great way to spend an hour, and we can't wait to try another challenge :)

room_title: Escape room "Lottery Lost" by Escape 812 in Indianapolis
review: I had a blast finding Grandma's winning lottery ticket! This was a fun family friendly outing that was worth the cost! Teamwork and communication is a must! We had so much fun we talked about it all during dinner and tried to figure out again what we just had done and who did what!

room_title: Escape room "Lottery Lost" by Escape 812 in Indianapolis
review: We escaped grandma's attic but only by seconds! It was challenging but a lot of fun! I would recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Lottery Lost" by Escape 812 in Indianapolis
review: We got very close but didn't quite make it out. It was very challenging and fun. The owners are so nice and made the experience great! Our family of four adults really enjoyed every minute. We look foward to coming back when they add a new room. Highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Lottery Lost" by Escape 812 in Indianapolis
review: What a unique way to spend the evening amongst friends! It was very challenging, but totally doable with teamwork and communication. Great environment! Wonderful hosts by John and Jeny. Very entertaining! We will be back when the next room is up and running! I'll be recommending you to friends and family for a great evening out!
